name: Youtubers Clicker
description:
Youtubers clicker - is a game where you goal is
to create your own partner company, combine all the tubers
and earn the maximum number of subscribers.
Ready? Good luck!

Features:
- Over 70 playable characters!
- Sign contracts, hire youtubers, attend events and arrange the room!
- Check your luck in the casino. Open the case with dollars and play the stock exchange!
- Fun achievements that change the interior of the room!
- Customize your own character!
